text: I can help you with that, dm me

Hi all, since today i am unable to upload the jquery js file to HubSpot, this is the only file that is giving me issues in my hs upload:
`A Error has occurred. Unable to upload "/Users/anthonymbp/Git/Mafo_Nov2023/src/js/lib/jquery.js. The post to 'mafo_nov2023/js/lib/jquery.js' in account XXX was forbidden.`

This seems to be happening with multiple themes of mine, please advise :slightly_smiling_face:
Canâ€™t say why it happens but as a workaround perhaps you could create a new file via the design manager and paste the contents of your local file into that and save it?
unfortunately that also doesnt work, it just keeps loading. luckily i already had it in this theme and no changes have been done. but my deploy failed because of it. No urgent matter for now :smile:
Is the jQuery you want to upload newer than the one you can activate under HubSpot settings?
yeah its 3.7.1 Never had problems with that before until today, but the same is happening with somewhat older versions like 3.6.3
